messages.subject: re; Game Instructions
messages.msgSnippet: A big Thank you! to those who responded to my request for the Where in the World instructions! I was both amazed and impressed at the speed with which the
messages.messageBody:
A big "Thank you!" to those who responded to my request for the "Where in the
World" instructions!

I was both amazed and impressed at the speed with which the responses came.
When I saw Barb's request for the "Risk" instructions, I was all excited, as
I thought I'd be able to give something back, but Lisa beat me to it.
(Naturally :-)) It was just as well, because afterwards when I told my
chidlren about it, they confessed that they've lost them anyway! But they've
played the game so often they know the rules. It's amazing, actually, how
often Risk is cited by them as the source of some geography fact they know.

Family tradition of course. I was - and still am - hopeless at geography.
But it's amazing how losing a Trivial Pursuit game to someone who actually
knows the stations at each end of the Trans-Siberian Railway indelibly
imprints the information on your mind!

Mattie
